name: Machine Yearning
description:
You've been tasked with taking care of your "friend", Derek's apartment. Too bad he has a bunch of appliances that need emotional support. 

Features - GREAT MOUTH FEEL, A TALKING TOILET, VIRTUALITY

Requirements :

*VIRTUAL REALITY*

*A MICROPHONE*

CREATED BY:

Chris Wade

Alexandria Heston

David Busch

Saam Pahlavan

Andrew Eiche

Music - Hip Jazz by BenSound

good luck!
